## ElementHandle.isIntersectingViewport(options) method

Resolves to true if the element is visible in the current viewport.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isIntersectingViewport(options): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { threshold?: number; } | An object of options. Accepts a threshold, which is the threshold allow to IntersectionObserver 's intersectionRatio value. Defaults to 0. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;
